title: God Promises Abram a Son
description:
Readings from:

Genesis 15:1-6

Romans 4:23-25

Today's passages were read by Kevin Garcia. Kevin works in a mentoring ministry in West Dallas and is a future church planter.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
